CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1950, pg. 24 reads: "After Santa Stopped Here, He Reloaded - So many presents were put under the Christmas tree for the children at the Davis Orphan Home on Simonton Street, run by Finley Davis, on the left rear, near the Christmas tree that Santa had to completely reload his sleigh when he left the institution. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of woman wearing shiny light colored dress, standing between two men wearing U.S. Army uniforms, standing in front of staircase in Davis Orphan Home, Simonton Street
